ShortDescription.Value: Change Speed limits on roads and highways.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Speed Limit Editor
## Usage
- Open Speed Limit tool through the button in top left corner. - Select a road segment by clicking on it, it should be highlighted on hovering. - Click on button with speed preset, or select the speed by using the slider. - The speed limit on selected segment will change immediately.
## Known issues and limitations
Speed will reset to default values on new road connections.
## Compatibility with other modifications
- Traffic - no issues detected (yet?), added lane connections would have the custom speed limit. - MoveIt - changes of road geometry do not affect the speed limits.
## Credits
Aberro - the author of this fork and update. SwiftCobra - the original mod author. krzychu124 - modder of Cities: Skylines discord channel, who helped a lot during the development.
